alert.note: Alert for Coastal Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:54PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 1254 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Royal Palm Ranches, or near Pembroke Pines, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Tamarac, Miami Gardens, Lauderhill, Oakland Park, Lauderdale Lakes, Dania Beach, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Wilton Manors, Lazy Lake, Royal Palm Ranches, Palm Springs North and St. George. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metro Broward County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
